title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems       Wolf Trap consists of rolling hills and gently sloping areas that lead to level flood plains and stream valley.  Outside the developed areas and the meadow, the park is predominantly wooded.  The park also encompasses a pond, parts of two streams, floodplains, meadowland, upland hardwood forest, landscaped cultural areas and impervious paved surfaces.
